result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Antoine Zebadiah Edwards

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Antoine Zebadiah Edwards appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney Brett Lee Copeland appeared by video for Antoine Zebadiah Edwards.  Attorney Michael Lonski in court for State of Wisconsin.  Calendared today for a plea however, Attorney Copeland recently appointed and requests adjourned status.
Status conference scheduled for November 30, 2022 at 10:00 am.
State Public Defender - Order Appointing Counsel received and filed.  bm
Notice of Completion of Representation by Attorney Colleen Taylor received and filed.  bm
Order to Withdraw signed and filed.  bm
Motion to Withdraw received and filed.  bm

Defendant Antoine Zebadiah Edwards in court with attorney Colleen A Taylor.  Defendant Antoine Zebadiah Edwards in custody.  Jennifer Tate for Dennis Patrick Murphy appeared for the State of Wisconsin.    Deputy Court Clerk:  bm
Status Conference held.  Attorney Taylor makes first appearance and requests adjourned status date as she is still reviewing discovery.  Court grants request.

Defendant Antoine Zebadiah Edwards in court with attorney Robert J Hampton.  Defendant Antoine Zebadiah Edwards in custody.  Michael Jerome Lonski appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk:  bm
  Motion of the defense counsel to withdraw granted by the Court.  Attorney Colleen Taylor will be new attorney of record.  Court orders case adjourned.  Status conference scheduled for August 4, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
records.descr: Motion and order for withdrawal of counsel

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Antoine Zebadiah Edwards in court with attorney Robert J Hampton.  Defendant Antoine Zebadiah Edwards in custody.  Michael Jerome Lonski for Dennis Patrick Murphy appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk: nk
Case in Court for Status Conference.  Defense still in negotiation with State.  Defense requested a Plea Hearing date.  Plea hearing scheduled for July 27, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Status conference scheduled for June 3, 2022 at 09:00 am.

Attorney Robert J Hampton in court, defendant Antoine Zebadiah Edwards not in court, in custody.  Dennis Patrick Murphy appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Both parties appear in person.
Court is advised that defendant has a pending case in Branch 12.
Defense counsel is requesting case be transferred to Branch 12 for global resolution.

Court orders case adjourned to Branch 12 on the next court date as to Case# 22CF0168.

Clerk:  jms

Defendant Antoine Zebadiah Edwards in court with attorney Robert J Hampton.  Defendant Antoine Zebadiah Edwards in custody.  
Dennis Patrick Murphy appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  
Deputy Court Clerk: rmm.  
Defense counsel waived reading of the Amended Information and entered a plea of not guilty on behalf of defendant.  Defendant has another case and Atty. Hampton is negotiating for a global offer.  Court does not object to transfer of this case for global resolution.  Case is adjourned to Br. 28.  Status conference scheduled for April 26, 2022 at 09:00 am.

Defendant Antoine Zebadiah Edwards in court with Attorney Robert J Hampton.  Defendant Antoine Zebadiah Edwards in custody.  Matthew Zisi appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  PARTIES APPEAR BY VIDEO.
Court took judicial notice of 11CF4543. Preliminary hearing proceeded.  Sworn for the State: MPD Officer B. Bender. State rests.  Defense rests.  Defense motion to dismiss argued and denied. Court found probable cause and bound defendant over for trial.  Original information received and filed;  defendant given a copy, waived reading. Defense requests an arraignment date.  Case is adjourned to Branch 28.  Hearing will be held on Dacast:  

https://iframe.dacast.com/live/4dafbf46-ed15-c11c-fa22-a58262833632/
   452841c5-7873-4077-b282-464ca6a86c2a  Arraignment scheduled for March 3, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Antoine Zebadiah Edwards in court with attorney Evan Barrett Weitz.  Defendant Antoine Zebadiah Edwards in custody.  Kaitlyn Lewis appeared for the State of Wisconsin.   All parties appeared by video conference.
  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Sanders, Branch 28. Defendant given a copy of the complaint and advised of maximum penalties, right to counsel and right to a preliminary hearing.  Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause to hold the defendant for further proceedings.  DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND PUBLIC DEFENDER WILL PROVIDE COUNSEL.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for January 26, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
Defendant in Custody, Court appearance today in Intake Court, Room 137A.
